name: Metal as Phuk
description: Metal as Phuk is a Mature, Turn-Based, Crude Comedy RPG that has one goal and one goal only: To Make You Laugh! Play as Chael, the last Paladin of the Metal Order, as he embarks on his journey to stop The Dark Bards before they can summon A'Marthius, a MONSTROUS Demon D-Bag!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98/XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 Mhz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode Storage: 575 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
